name: Ryobi Buffing and Polishing Microfiber and Synthetic Fleece Bonnet Set
description: Ryobi introduces the Ryobi 2-Piece 4 - 7 in. Microfiber and Synthetic Fleece Bonnet Set. This bonnet is supposed to be used for buffing and polishing hardwood floors, vehicles and coated surfaces.California residents: see Proposition 65 informationCompatible with 4 - 7 in. buffers and polishersFor buffing and polishing hardwood floors, vehicles and coated surfacesGreat for applying and removing waxIncludes (1 ) 4 - 7 in. microfiber bonnet and (1) 4-7 in. synthetic wool bonnet
